content: happy valley scarf - as seen on sarah lancashire the much loved bbc british crime drama happy valley starring sarah lancashire returned to our screens early in 2023 the series hosted a variety of hand knits and crochet blankets one being the popular scarf sarah wears throughout many episodes the scarf was a social media sensation so we decided to do a bit of digging and are delighted to say that it was actually made by local to black sheep costume supervisor sam green with yarn purchased from our craft barn find out more 1 1 https //www blacksheepwools com/blogs/news/happy-valley-scarf-as-seen-on-sarah-lancashire
